topics.title: Introduction to Programming
topics.description: Programming is the process of writing instructions for a computer to execute.

content.description: Programming is done using various languages such as JavaScript, Python, C++, etc.

topics.title: Variables and Data Types
topics.description: Variables are containers for storing data values.

content.description: JavaScript supports different data types like string, number, boolean, etc.
Variables can be defined using var, let, or const.

topics.title: Functions
topics.description: Functions are reusable blocks of code that perform a specific task.

content.description: A function is defined using the function keyword, followed by the function name and parameters.

topics.title: Loops
topics.description: Loops are used to execute a block of code repeatedly.

content.description: A for loop is often used when you know the number of iterations in advance.
A while loop continues to execute until a condition is no longer true.

topics.title: Arrays
topics.description: Arrays are used to store multiple values in a single variable.

content.description: Arrays can store values of the same type, like numbers or strings.
Arrays can be multidimensional, allowing you to store arrays inside arrays.
You can also store different types of elements in an array.
Arrays can be iterated using loops.
